front.title: •Ghoel
front.gametext: Deploys only at interior sites. Cannot move. During a battle at same site, may target one character present. Draw destiny. If destiny +3 > ability, target may not use ability toward drawing battle destiny this turn.
front.lore: Wol Cabbasshite. Immobile. Species evolved from parasites. Mistakenly left in Jabba's palace. No one suspects its intelligence. Often tries to lick passersby.

combo: Ghoel + Affect Mind Ghoel makes Affect Mind much more useful, as the removal of up to six ability, plus two from Affect Mind, can total eight ability away from battle destiny, a significant amount, especially if your opponent is relying on Vader.
